Smart image insertion - detect element type, create img if needed
description:
When dropping/inserting an image onto an element:
1. If it's an img tag: replace src
2. If it's a div/section/container: 
   - Check if it has a child img - use that
   - Otherwise create an img element inside it OR use background-image
3. Generate proper source patch with srcChange or cssChanges
4. Use consistent image naming (hash-based) to prevent duplicates
5. Support both drag-drop and chat-based insertion
